INTERSHOP IOM 4.1.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision 788bd54f40138259be73695184abb394c899f5ee)

Table oms.RoleDO

RoleDOs are used to define collections of rights(permissions). User can only have permissions through role assignments. These roles are all accessible and editable in OMT.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id bigint PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
description text  
name varchar(50) UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
version integer jpa standard versioning attribute. 
isSystem boolean NOT_NULL false unused for now. 

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.
